comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the amount of money invested in apartments and y be the amount of money invested in townhouses, both non-negative integers.",
    "CONSTRAINTS": [
        "x + y \leq 600,000",
        "x \leq 200,000",
        "x \geq 0.5y",
        "x \geq 0",
        "y \geq 0"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Maximize 0.10x + 0.15y"
}
